last_episode_to_air.name: A Big Bad Secret!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ramona Badwolf, daughter of the Big Bad Wolf, gets returns to Ever After High, and resumes her rivalry with Cerise Hood.

name: Ever After High
overview: The students of all the fairytale characters attend Ever After High, where they are either Royals (students who want to follow in their parent's footsteps) or Rebels (students who wish to write their own destiny).

episodes.name: Stark Raven Mad
episodes.overview: Apple White is royally ready for Legacy Day! But her world -- and the entire world of Ever After High - will be flipped on its crown if Raven Queen questions her destiny instead of pledging it. Can Apple save her Happily Ever After from becoming a Happily NEVER After?

episodes.name: True Reflections
episodes.overview: Mirror, mirror tell me true -- can Apple and Raven find another mirror like you? While Apple usually knows her mirror's answers, she's throne for a loop after Raven's magical aim interferes with her reflection.

episodes.name: Maddie-in-Chief
episodes.overview: Madeline Hatter decides to go off script and run against Apple White™ in the Royal Student Council Election. Will Maddie's riddlish-filled debate win over the other students, or is she putting the cup before the kettle?

episodes.name: Briar's Study Party
episodes.overview: Professor Rumplestilskin's plan of failing all the students may have worked in the past, but he may have met his match with Briar Beauty. She HAS been studying Forever After, you know. Now, if she can only keep her eyes open long enough to help the other students...

episodes.name: Here Comes Cupid
episodes.overview: She may be the new girl at Ever After High, but C.A. Cupid could teach a class in helping people find love. Lucky for Hopper, she may have arrived just in time to help him find his Happily Ever After.

episodes.name: The Shoe Must Go On
episodes.overview: With less than an hour to set up the display for her new shoes in the Glass Slipper Shoe Store, Ashlynn Ella turns to her friends 'til THE END for help. But with Blondie trying to make everything 'just right', and Briar falling asleep, this display may turn out to be a total fairy fail.

episodes.name: The Cat Who Cried Wolf
episodes.overview: Cerise Hood has successfully kept her family secret hidden under lock and key. But when Kitty Ceshire catches her up to some unusual activity in the woods, she tries to unravel her secret like a ball of yarn in front of the school.

episodes.name: Cedar Wood Would Love to Lie
episodes.overview: When Professor Jack B. Nimble gives the class an assignment to create their own tall tales, Cedar Wood knows her curse of never being able to tell a lie could get in her way. Unfortunately for Huntlynn, Cedar comes across a secret picnic and finds the perfect story to tell her class.

episodes.name: Catching Raven
episodes.overview: C.A. Cupid's heart may be for Dexter Charming, but she happily offers guidance when he needs help asking out Raven Queen to Briar's party. Can this shy prince find the courage to charm her?

episodes.name: The Day Ever After
episodes.overview: Legacy Day may have come and gone, but Raven's decision to choose her own destiny has throne the Royals for a wicked loop. Will the two groups ever see crown to crown?

episodes.name: Replacing Raven
episodes.overview: With the help of Maddie, Raven decides to go off script to find a new storybook nemesis for Apple. Her search is shorter than expected when an evil classmate steps up to blow the house down. Dun, dun, dun!

episodes.name: Blondie's Just Right
episodes.overview: When Blondie Lockes uses her MirrorCast to prove that Ever After High's legends are true, Headmaster Grimm goes to great lengths to make sure her show ends up being just right.

episodes.name: True Hearts Day - Part 1
episodes.overview: Spring is in the air at Ever After High, and following their true heart's desires is the only thing on students' minds. Or it was, until C.A. Cupid came across The History of True Hearts Day book and rallied the students to spellebrate the long-lost True Hearts Day holiday.

episodes.name: True Hearts Day - Part 2
episodes.overview: With Duchess Swan about to flip the script on Ashlynn Ella and Hunter Huntsman's romance, Huntlynn decides to enlist the help of their friend 'til THE END Cedar Wood to see if they should take matters into their own hands.

episodes.name: True Hearts Day - Part 3
episodes.overview: All the students are getting fairest for the most hexcellent school dance, though Duchess Swan has a sneaky plan under her wing that could blow the house down on the big event.

episodes.name: Class Confusion
episodes.overview: When Raven Queen decides to sign up for Princessology, Apple White decides to flip the script and sign up for Home Evilnomics to spite her roomie. Though, she may get more than she bargained for...

episodes.name: Apple's Birthday Bake-Off
episodes.overview: Apple White is upset when Raven Queen wants to bake her a birthday cake that is NOT poisoned, so Briar Beauty steps up to make sure her BFFA has the best birthday ever after.

episodes.name: The Beautiful Truth
episodes.overview: When Cedar Wood enters the Royal beauty pageant, she inspires Apple White to spellabrate the true meaning of beauty.

episodes.name: MirrorNet Down
episodes.overview: The students panic when the MirrorNet goes down at school and rally together to find the unhexpected culprit behind the crash.

episodes.name: Rebel's Got Talent
episodes.overview: Raven Queen and Sparrow Hood go head-to-head in a wicked awesome guitar duel at the annual school talent show.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Table
episodes.overview: Maddie and her friends try to tone down the wonder of her family tea shop before Blondie Lockes arrives to film a review. They soon discover the shop is tea-riffic just the way it is.

episodes.name: Blondie Branches Out
episodes.overview: Blondie Lockes tries to uncover if she's really a Royal when the students are assigned to research their family trees.

episodes.name: Poppy the Roybel
episodes.overview: Poppy O'Hair tries to decide whether she's a Royal or Rebel—or a little of both.

episodes.name: O'Hair's Split Ends
episodes.overview: When Holly and Poppy O'Hair discover they were switched at birth, the fairy different twins decide to continue following the stories they always thought were their destinies.

episodes.name: Maddie's Hat-Tastic Party
episodes.overview: When Wonderland Grove needs a boost of wonder, Madeline Hatter decides to throws a tea-riffic tea party to recharge this magical spot.

episodes.name: Lizzie Heart's Fairytale First Date
episodes.overview: Daring Charming is challenged to go a date with Lizzie Hearts...and ends up being unhexpectedly charmed by her!

episodes.name: Apple’s Princess Practice
episodes.overview: Apple White may be the fairest of them all, but there are more than tiaras and tea parties in the typical day of this busy Royal.

episodes.name: Lizzie Shuffles the Deck
episodes.overview: Lizzie Hearts realizes that following her mother’s wicked advice may not be in the cards for her.

episodes.name: Duchess Swan's Lake
episodes.overview: Duchess Swan finds out that slime is being dumped into the Enchanted Lake. She then forms an unlikely alliance with Ashlynn and Hunter to put a stop to the slime.

episodes.name: Cerise's Picnic Panic
episodes.overview: Hunter Huntsman tries to save Cerise Hood and her Mother from the Big Bad Wolf when he unknowingly stumbles upon their family picnic in the Enchanted Forest.

episodes.name: Kitty's Curious Tale
episodes.overview: The narrators are fighting about which side are most of the Ever After High students on. Royal or Rebel. They were starting to compare one student to the other when Madeline Hatter had pointed at the fact that nobody knew which side Kitty Cheshire was one and the narrators were also stumped.

episodes.name: Thronecoming
episodes.overview: When Apple votes Raven Queen for the end of the year party. she wants to sign the story book of legends. Only thanks to Cedar they discover it is not the real book. they turn to Maddie for help and find an old mirror portal in the headmaster's office. They will travel to a dangerous world and fight an old evil to get the real book back. Will they get their happily ever after. Who will be become the throne coming king and queen? This is the special one hour season finale.

episodes.name: And The Throne Coming Queen Is
episodes.overview: Dexter goes backstage and asks the girls what they would do as queen. The results for Throne Coming Queen are revealed and Raven is crowned Throne Coming Queen.

episodes.name: Cupid Comes Clean... Kinda
episodes.overview: When Cupid is made Dexter's lab partner but sees that both he and Raven like each other she decides to tell them herself and make them lab partners.

episodes.name: Best Feather Forward
episodes.overview: Duchess Swan believes she's destined to fail her Muse-ic Class project--until Humphrey Dumpty lends a hand.

episodes.name: Ginger in the Breadhouse
episodes.overview: Ginger Breadhouse gets a little help from Raven Queen when she tries to prove to everyone that she just wants to bake spellbinding treats, not follow her story.

episodes.name: Ashlynn's Fashion Frolic
episodes.overview: Ashlynn Ella’s evil stepsisters try to steal the spotlight at her spelltacular fashion show, but when the clock strikes 12, they find out what it’s like in their stepsister’s shoes.

episodes.name: An Hexclusive Invitation
episodes.overview: Ashlynn gets an invitation to the exclusive Blue Moon Forest Fest, but Faybelle Thorn, daughter of the Dark Fairy, is only looking forward to causing trouble.

episodes.name: Chosen with Care
episodes.overview: Ashlynn decides who to invite to the Forest Fest, and Dexter works up the nerve to ask Raven out.

episodes.name: Just Sweet
episodes.overview: Dexter and Raven receive dating advice from two unlikely sources.

episodes.name: Through the Woods
episodes.overview: Ashlynn and Cupid head to the Forest Fest with Blondie and Poppy, but Faybelle is plotting her revenge for not being invited.

episodes.name: Baking and Entering
episodes.overview: Hungry from their journey into the Dark Forest, the girls stop at a gingerbread house, Miss Muffet's Frozen Yogurt Bar and the home of the three bears in search of a spellbinding snack.

episodes.name: Date Night
episodes.overview: Raven and Dexter overcome their wicked nerves to enjoy an enchanting first date at multi-hex theater.

episodes.name: Driving Me Cuckoo
episodes.overview: Raven takes Baba Yaga’s office for a spin to help save her friends in the Dark Forest.

episodes.name: Bog Bash
episodes.overview: A grumpy forest troll threatens the girls’ ever after, but Poppy’s makeover skills just may save them.

episodes.name: Faybelle's Choice
episodes.overview: Will this story end happily ever after when Faybelle admits her wicked scheme and tries to rescue the girls in the Dark Forest?

episodes.name: The Legacy Orchard
episodes.overview: The Ever After High students uncover a magical orchard destined to help them share their stories with future fairytales.

episodes.name: Sugar Coated
episodes.overview: Raven sends Maddie’s cooking class into total chaos after her spell to save the bake sale goes awry.

episodes.name: Fairest on Ice
episodes.overview: Poppy and Duchess find themselves in the most hexciting skating event to forever after grace the pages of an Ever After High yearbook.

episodes.name: Heart Struck
episodes.overview: Misguided love is in the air after Hunter unwittingly fires off a few of Cupid’s magical star-crossed arrows.

episodes.name: Bunny + Alistair 4 Ever After
episodes.overview: Brooke Page takes over as narrator because her parents have to run some errands. As requested by Apple White, Bunny is tasked to ask Alistair regarding the details of the chess club for the yearbook. Brooke spoils it and claims that Bunny will kiss Alistair, but Kitty objects her statement. At first, Bunny and Alistair start off awkwardly and get interrupted by Kitty, who's watching from afar. Brooke decides on rewinding the scene and this time, making it rain so that Bunny would have no choice but to get closer to Alistair. Instead, Bunny runs off so that she wouldn't embarrass herself any further. For a final attempt, Brooke rewinds and lets the scene play out naturally without any interruptions between the two, and things turn out just as planned.

episodes.name: Croquet-Tastrophe
episodes.overview: Lizzie proposes that Apple and Raven settle their dispute over the yearbook with a croquet match.

episodes.name: Save Me, Darling
episodes.overview: Darling Charming uncovers her heroic side after a wild dragon sets his sights on her friends forever after.

episodes.name: Rosabella and the Beasts
episodes.overview: Rosabella organizes a page-ripping search party after Faybelle casts a devious spell over the enchanted forest animals.

episodes.name: What's in the Cards for Courtly Jester?
episodes.overview: Courtly gives some details about her new start at Ever After High.

episodes.name: Tri-Castle-On
episodes.overview: It’ll take a marathon of a miracle for Apple and Raven to get back to the Legacy Orchard in time to plant their class’s yearbook tree seed.

episodes.name: Moonlight Mystery
episodes.overview: Tired of having to tap her toes on the sideline of her favorite class, Justine Dancer and her friends 'til THE END set out to solve the mystery of her disappearing dancing shoes!

episodes.name: Wish List
episodes.overview: Can Farrah Goodfairy's friends band together to help make her Happily Ever After wish come true before the clock strikes noon?

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Parties
episodes.overview: Ashlynn and Holly attempt a daring costume change in an effort to attend two theme parties on the same night and avoid Faybelle's wicked curse.

episodes.name: Piping Hot Beats
episodes.overview: Melody Piper may be in a turntable of trouble if she can't control her music and stop a spell that has caused the entire school to dance uncontrollably!

episodes.name: Thumb-believable!
episodes.overview: A cancelled school field trip won't shrink Nina Thumbell's thirst for adventure! She's ready to show her friends a wildly fun side of Ever After High that they've never seen before.

episodes.name: Beanstalk Bravado
episodes.overview: Jullian Beanstalk gives Humphrey Dumpty a crash course in bravery, but will he rise to the challenge and face his fears or crack under the pressure?

episodes.name: Meeshell Comes Out of Her Shell
episodes.overview: Maddie helps a new friend from feeling like a fish out of water after the mysterious fairytale arrives on the same day as the Ever After High talent show!

episodes.name: There's No Business Like Snow Business
episodes.overview: A behind-the-scenes tour of a winter wonderland has Maddie and Apple in snow much trouble that they must turn to the princess of winter to help save the day.

episodes.name: A Big Bad Secret!
episodes.overview: Ramona Badwolf, daughter of the Big Bad Wolf, gets returns to Ever After High, and resumes her rivalry with Cerise Hood.
